text: A Hinomɨn danganir zarimɨn iraghugha, uan otarir mabav soghezɨ me ariaghirezɨ, a ofan bar isia mɨghɨrimɨn mɨn me tuezɨ me bar isia mɨghɨri. Egha a uabɨn akuraghasa ariaghirezir gumazamizibar duabar diava, uaghan uabɨn akurvaghasa kukunir gumazibar azai, egha akavsiar igharagha garir avɨribagh ami. Manase arazir kurar avɨriba Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn dagh ami, ezɨ an arazir kurar kaba Ikiavɨra Itir God gamizɨ, a bar anɨngaghe.
